controllers

Class PhotoViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controllers.PhotoViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LogoutEvent

    public class PhotoViewController
extends java.lang.Object
implements LogoutEvent
    This class handles the view for individual photos as represented by photoview.fxml. Displays a larger view of the selected photo. Implements LogoutEvent.
    Author:
    Derek Schatel

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage mainstage)
        Sets up initial view for the photo. Sets the photo in the imageView and updates specific details about the image.
        Parameters:
        mainstage - the main stage

      • setAdminList

        public void setAdminList(AdminList adminList)
        Allows a calling class to set the serialized adminlist.
        Parameters:
        adminList - the adminlist

      • setUser

        public void setUser(User user)
        Allows a calling class to set the current user
        Parameters:
        user - the current user

      • setAlbum

        public void setAlbum(Album album)
        Allows a calling class to set the current album
        Parameters:

      • setPhoto

        public void setPhoto(Photo photo)
        Allows a calling class to set the current photo
        Parameters:
        photo - the current photo

      • handleAddTag

        private void handleAddTag()
        Handles adding tags to the photo. Prompts the user with a dialog box for tag type and value, then adds the tag to the tag list.

      • handleDeleteTag

        private void handleDeleteTag()
        Prompts the user to confirm tag deletion. On confirmation, deletes the selected tag from the tag list.

      • handleMovePhoto

        private void handleMovePhoto()
        Prompts the user with a dialog box displaying a ListView of all albums in the user's account. Selecting an album and confirming move will then remove the photo from the current album and add it to the photo list of the specified album.

      • handleCopyPhoto

        private void handleCopyPhoto()
        Will prompt the user with a ListView of all albums on the user's account. On confirmation, will add the current photo to the photo list of the specified album.

      • handleReturnButton

        private void handleReturnButton(javafx.stage.Stage mainstage)
        Transitions the scene to the album page containing the currently viewed photo or to the search page, depending on what view the user previously came from.
        Parameters:
        mainstage - the main stage

      • handleCaptionButton

        private void handleCaptionButton()
        Adds a caption to the photo.
